title: The tech inside the new Lotus Eletre EV hints at autonomous driving ambitions - TechCrunch
content: The tech inside the new Lotus Eletre EV hints at autonomous driving ambitions  TechCrunch
description: Lotus unveiled Tuesday a battery-electric “hyper” SUV called the Eletre — the first of a trio of EVs Lotus plans to launch over the next four years. The upshot? The Eletre, which means “coming to life,” is the British brand’s first utility vehicle and a crucial p…
